tool_description: Multilanguage text auto segmentation using NLP. Supported Languages: English, Chinese, German, French, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese & Russian.
name: Auto Segmentation
title: Auto Segmentation

api_list.name: Auto Segmentation Korean Text
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the segments from the given Korean text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://auto-segmentation.p.rapidapi.com/api/segmentation/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "auto-segmentation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
